Reviews.Title: The worst purchase I ever made
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 phones which supposed to be new. One of them worked fine, the second one  was not new. It was damaged. The SIM Card holder was missing a contact. The phone was not unlocked. I contacted the vendor's direct phone line and they never got back with me. I already spent $75.00 in getting it to work. I am currently in the Dominican Republic where I brought both phones as a gift to relatives. I will be back in the US this Saturday and will write a detail review. Again this was the worst online purchase I ever made.

Reviews.Title: blackberry 8520
Reviews.Author: Reinaldo Colina "Colina"
Reviews.Content: English:It's not new at all quite sure that the product is not new, the charger never served, as it is explained that a new charger does not work? the seller must test the product before selling it. the phone works fine with the operators of my country but again not new is remanufactured.Español:No es nuevo, para nada muy seguro que el producto no es nuevo, el cargador no sirvio nunca, como se explica que un cargador nuevo no funciona? el vendedor debe probar el producto antes de venderlo. el telefono trabaja bien con las operadoras de mi pais Venezuela pero insisto no es nuevo es refabricado. sirve con movilnet.

Reviews.Title: refurbished
Reviews.Author: Patiarroy
Reviews.Content: this phone is refurbished and badly damaged, never buy from (Wireovia) only work a week and when the technician opened the phone it was a disaster

Reviews.Title: worst online purchase
Reviews.Author: lorace
Reviews.Content: I bought two supposedly new phones one has loose screws which were already removed. the other one the scroll button has frozen. I'm on vacation with two useless phones. You need to do better

Reviews.Title: Bought used phone
Reviews.Author: Dude George "George"
Reviews.Content: Phone is a good Blackberry and had no problems with the phone itself or getting onto my local phone network, just dropped in my SIM and up and running ... Not much else to sayEdit:It has been several months now and phone has preformed flawlessly, could not be happier.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: johanam
Reviews.Content: excellent product, I loved it, so I will use for a good occasion, I recommend it 100%, good presentation, thanks

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Pet
Reviews.Content: this phone came in a very good condition it was like new, no scratch, no prob so far, and its a bit different from other curves ive seen was a good buy

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: The One
Reviews.Content: I love this product very much. The product is clean, looks new and I would encourage anyone to buy this product. This is what I expected and great Job seller. AAAAA++++++++

Reviews.Title: Exceptional
Reviews.Author: Ian Ayton
Reviews.Content: phone arrive very early and was surprise with a memory card added for free. This is exceptional service and was above expectation.

Reviews.Title: my charger port fell out in less than a week
Reviews.Author: Juliet
Reviews.Content: My charger port fell out on the 5th day.  I believe that this phone was refurbished and not new as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry 8520
Reviews.Author: hengerberth diaz
Reviews.Content: Excelente el producto, no he tenido fallas algunas con el teléfono funciona todas sus funciones,tal cual lo indican en la pagina.

Reviews.Title: Excelente Producto y vendedor
Reviews.Author: american Supply
Reviews.Content: El Celular llego en excelente estado, el tiempo de entrega fue muy rapido. Funciona a la perfeccion en Venezuela con Movistar. Aun no lo pruebo con otra Compania,

Reviews.Title: Waste of $$$:
Reviews.Author: Canalero1
Reviews.Content: Pros: Worked well, for a While, lol.Cons. Did not die Suddenly. Just Fell Apart daily, From the outside In.  Just Faded Away Daily, until..., No More...!

Reviews.Title: BlackBerry
Reviews.Author: JavierOcandoC
Reviews.Content: Phone is a good Blackberry and had no problems with the phone itself or getting onto my local phone network, just dropped in my SIM and up and running

Reviews.Title: Is It New Or Not?
Reviews.Author: Dean Corso
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent phone especially new BUT from the reviews here stating this is NOT a new phone as advertised, who would by one? This not from just one person but many. Not me or anyone I know. This company needs to tell the truth or Amazon needs to get rid of them!

Reviews.Title: Nice Blackberry cell phone
Reviews.Author: Yuri
Reviews.Content: Nice cell phone from Blackberry, very useful to check email, calendar, take pictures and keep all your contacts in one place.

Reviews.Title: sterling
Reviews.Author: Victor
Reviews.Content: Excellent what I expected, I recommend fully responsible store, the product is new, is the attention that you expect from the stores here, so should be all ...

Reviews.Title: Excelente equipo
Reviews.Author: Melvi A. Lemoine
Reviews.Content: Excelente equipo, lo recomiendo a quienes desean tener un buen equipo por mucho tiempo, es lo mejor que BB ha tirado al mercado.

Reviews.Title: bien para el precio
Reviews.Author: cehily martin
Reviews.Content: si viene liberado lo estoy utilizando en venezuela  buen telefono. le puse un chip movilnet y tiene señal. la corneta suena un poco baja

Reviews.Title: Excelente Equipo
Reviews.Author: Massiah
Reviews.Content: Buen Rendimiento, fácil de usar. Totalmente recomendado. El proveedor entrego el producto en muy buen tiempo. No deje de adquirir este equipo.

Reviews.Title: malo
Reviews.Author: yhonny aponte
Reviews.Content: el equipo llego dañado ni prendia se supone que era nuevo y creo que era reconstruido bueno perdi el dinero

Reviews.Title: El equipo NO es nuevo
Reviews.Author: kerry
Reviews.Content: I bought a new article. The article's descrpticion is "NEW" and the item is refurbished. Prices are differente when the item is new or refurbished. I want my money back. The money need to be refund. I am waiting for you answer...

Reviews.Title: Good Service
Reviews.Author: JOSE
Reviews.Content: The product is good 100% and was shipped in the same day and im fine with the service The product is good 100% and was shipped in the same day and im fine with the service. Love it

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: oscar
Reviews.Content: Excelent product everything's good I,m very satisfaced sito it. I recomend tris product to all people that want it. Good

Reviews.Title: Alejandro
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Martinez
Reviews.Content: "caracas Venezuela excelente servicio lo descrito por el vendedor lo recomiendo cien por ciento justo el producto q necesitaba Gracias"

Reviews.Title: buen telefono 8520
Reviews.Author: darwin guatarasma
Reviews.Content: muy buen producto, cumple con mis expectativas y requerimientos, producto llego a tiempo y en excelentes condiciones por parte del vendedor, se los recomiendo para futuras compras

Reviews.Title: BB ok
Reviews.Author: jean
Reviews.Content: I kids  loveit and everithing it's ok , arrive just in time in my local, the package don't have any troubble and the price is so cheap for that reason a buy more

Reviews.Title: Excelente los recomiendo
Reviews.Author: Guillermo Diaz
Reviews.Content: excelente los aparatos estan nuevos y en muy buen estado les seguire comprando y esperando que sigan manteniendo la excelencia en sus aparatos

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: Haydee
Reviews.Content: Hola, disculpen la demora, si recibi mi telefono celular curve 8520, en buenas condiciones, es facil, rapido y comodo comprar por este medio; nunca antes lo habia hecho realmente, los felicito por ser tan responsables, gracias..

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve
Reviews.Author: yankeefan
Reviews.Content: The quality of the phone is just as advertised. I have not had any problems in the last 3 weeks since I have been using it. The service from the vendor was very good.

Reviews.Title: Todo Bien.
Reviews.Author: Carlos Cordoba
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto. Fue entregado en el tiempo previsto y funciona perfectamente en Venezuela. Tiene dos semanas de uso y no ha presentado ningùn problema...

Reviews.Title: Telefono en malas condiciones y usado
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: Compre el teléfono bb 8520, decía que era nuevo, la pantalla no funcionaba, lleve al servicio técnico y me indicaron que era usado

Reviews.Title: Inconforme
Reviews.Author: Carlos Garcia
Reviews.Content: Llego sin la factura y me dio problemas, no me llegaron los auidifonos y no me deja cambiarle el idioma, con razon el precio

Reviews.Title: very well
Reviews.Author: neonitro
Reviews.Content: Very nice phone: unlocked, delivery shipping OK, new box, the only bad thing is that this model doesn't iclude any leather case neither the memory card. The phone works correctly! battery, software already updated, everything...even when is used in different country: It's working perfectly with Movistar line, Venezuela.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Francisco Dousdebes "Pancho"
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd Blackberry phone I buy and all have been great purchases. Top performance, no hassles, no surprises, affordable price.  Seller was professional at delivering the phone right on time (thank you!).  Unlocked phone works well on all my international trips.  Will buy it again (if needed) and from the same seller. Thank You!

Reviews.Title: WIREOVIA,  ¡¡ EXCELENTE !!
Reviews.Author: Epifanio
Reviews.Content: ESTOY TOTALMENTE SATISFECHO CON WIREOVIA, HAN CUMPLIDO CON EL TIEMPO ESTIPULADO, EL CELL. LLEGO EN PERFECTA CONDICIÓN Y FUNCIONA MUY BIEN EN VENEZUELA Y ADEMAS WIREOVIA NOS ENTREGA UN PEQUEÑO REGALO.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: akkend
Reviews.Content: Muy bueno el producto todo salio bien saludos desde venezuela feliz navidad muchas gracias lo empacaron muy bien feliz año nuevo 2012

Reviews.Title: Not satisfied by the item received
Reviews.Author: IAA
Reviews.Content: When I opened the BB cell phone in the back inside part it had sulphate in several places. I have used it and it seems to work ok  but why did it have sulphate inside ? I think it was not new and I had ordered a new cell phone.

Reviews.Title: my purchase
Reviews.Author: Blackberry 8520
Reviews.Content: Every step of the process was perfect and easy.  I received my BB the date they gave me and it works perfect

Reviews.Title: buen servicio
Reviews.Author: Humberto Jose Cordero "humberto"
Reviews.Content: bueno el articulo se recibio en muy buen estado se guire haciendo negocios en el futuro con este proveedor  el articlo llego en la fecha indicada

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Aldemar
Reviews.Content: Es un muy buen producto el que he adquirido, les recomiendo ya que por la marca es muy bueno y ademas es liviano, es lindo, me gusta mucho

Reviews.Title: mi opinion
Reviews.Author: lis
Reviews.Content: el tlf esta muy bien y funciona aca en vzla bien lo unico es un detalle en la  pantalla 2 manchas muy pequeñas..contenido tlf, cargador de pared, cargado del carro,y bateria..l tlf lo pedi refurbished
